actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to permit individuals to continue health plan coverage of services while participating in approved clinical studies.
short_title: Improved Patient Access to Clinical Studies Act of 1996
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Improved Patient Access to Clinical Studies Act of 1996 - Prohibits a health plan from denying, limiting, imposing additional conditions on, or discriminating against an enrollee on the basis of the enrollee's participation in an approved clinical study.

titles.title: Improved Patient Access to Clinical Studies Act of 1996
A bill to permit individuals to continue health plan coverage of services while participating in approved clinical studies.
